sentences.sContent: In economically advanced countries, women marry later.
sentences.sCn: 在经济发达国家，女性结婚比较晚。

sentences.sContent: We produce food as economically as possible.
sentences.sCn: 我们生产食品时力求节省。

sentences.sContent: ...not just economically and politically but in all sorts of other ways too...
...What does Alberto say about economically successful countries...

synos.tran: 经济地；在经济上；节俭地

phrases.pCn: 经济上可行的，经济上合算

words.tran: 经济的，经济上的；经济学的
经济学；国家的经济状况
节约装置；节约者；经济家

trans.tranOther: in a way that is related to systems of money, trade, or business
